SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.datasift
Class User

java.lang.Object
  org.datasift.User

public class User
extends java.lang.Object

The User class represents a user of the API. Applications should start their API interactions by creating an instance of this class. Once initialised it provides factory methods for all of the functionality in the API.

_api_base_url

public static java.lang.String _api_base_url
The base URL for API calls. No http://, and with the trailing slash.

See Also:
StreamConsumer

createPushDefinition

public PushDefinition createPushDefinition()
Create a push subscription for this user. Note that you must call the save method to actually create the subscription on the server.

Parameters:
String - output_type The output_type of the required push subscription.
String - hash_type The type of hash being supplied (stream or historic).
String - hash The stream hash or historic playback ID.
String - name A name for this push subscription.
Returns:
PushSubscription
Throws:
EInvalidData
